quote: I threw my hands on my hips, shocked by the irony. A Mather helping a Greensmith? Hell was freezing over somewhere beneath our feet and every kind of farm animal was sprouting wings to fly.
quote_letters: I THREW MY HANDS ON MY HIPS SHOCKED BY THE IRONY A MATHER HELPING A GREENSMITH HELL WAS FREEZING OVER SOMEWHERE BENEATH OUR FEET AND EVERY KIND OF FARM ANIMAL WAS SPROUTING WINGS TO FLY
